block.p: * Edward Tobin was named to the new position of technology director at Poppe Tyson Interactive West, Mountain View, Calif., a unit of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt. He was previously senior technology director at Eagle River Interactive, Mountain View.

* Edward Tobin was named to the new position of technology director at Poppe Tyson Interactive West, Mountain View, Calif., a unit of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt. He was previously senior technology director at Eagle River Interactive, Mountain View.

* Alyson Kanney was named publisher of Better Homes and Gardens Family Money magazine, New York, published by the Meredith Corporation, assuming responsibilities from Jerry Kaplan, who continues as vice president for magazine group sales. Ms. Kanney was previously publisher of Northwest Airlines World Traveler magazine, New York, also published by Meredith.

* Richard Dee Jr. was named advertising director at Appellation magazine, Napa, Calif., published by Scripps Enterprises Inc., succeeding Leslie Motto, who left. Mr. Dee had been sales director at Spafax, New York, an airline entertainment production and marketing company.
